channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Harris courts Black male voters. And, worries that Israel is starving north Gaza
item.description: Vice President Harris will discuss her new proposals to win over Black male voters today at a town hall event. And, aid groups fear Israel is starving people in northern Gaza.
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Harris will discuss her new proposals to win over Black male voters today at a town hall event. And, aid groups fear Israel is starving people in northern Gaza.

(Image credit: Brendan Smialowski)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: A Nobel prize for an explanation of why nations fail
item.description: A trio of economists just won a Nobel prize for their insights into how democratic and other inclusive institutions are critical for a nation’s prosperity.
item.content:encoded:
A trio of economists just won a Nobel prize for their insights into how democratic and other inclusive institutions are critical for a nation’s prosperity.

(Image credit: CHRISTINE OLSSON/TT/TT NEWS AGENCY/AFP via Getty Ima)
item.dc:creator: Greg Rosalsky

item.title: Petroleum drilling technology is now making carbon-free power
item.description: A new technique for harvesting geothermal energy being pioneered in Utah has passed a significant milestone: Southern California Edison has contracted for enough of the energy to power 400,000 homes.
item.content:encoded:
A new technique for harvesting geothermal energy being pioneered in Utah has passed a significant milestone: Southern California Edison has contracted for enough of the energy to power 400,000 homes.

(Image credit: David Condos)
item.dc:creator: David Condos

item.title: Ukraine is amping up drone production to get an edge in the war against Russia
item.content:encoded: (Image credit: Claire Harbage)
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kakissis

item.title: Migrant deaths in New Mexico have increased tenfold
item.description: Experts say smugglers are treating migrants more harshly and bringing them on paths that could be more dangerous in extreme summer temperatures.
item.content:encoded:
Experts say smugglers are treating migrants more harshly and bringing them on paths that could be more dangerous in extreme summer temperatures.

(Image credit: Morgan Lee)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Canada expels India's top diplomat and alleges wider diplomatic involvement in crimes
item.description: Canada expelled India’s top diplomat in the country and five others over last year's killing of a Sikh activist in British Columbia. India rejected the charges and said it would expel Canadian envoys.
item.content:encoded:
Canada expelled India’s top diplomat in the country and five others over last year's killing of a Sikh activist in British Columbia. India rejected the charges and said it would expel Canadian envoys.

(Image credit: Justin Tang/AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: North Korea blows up parts of inter-Korean roads as tensions with South Korea soar
item.description: Destroying the roads would be in line with Kim Jong Un's push to cut off ties with South Korea and abandon the decades-long objective to seek a peaceful unification.
item.content:encoded:
Destroying the roads would be in line with Kim Jong Un's push to cut off ties with South Korea and abandon the decades-long objective to seek a peaceful unification.

(Image credit: Ahn Young-joon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Harris brings a bit of Trump into her rally to try to show him as ‘unhinged’
item.description: Vice President Harris wants voters to pay more attention when Trump talks about "the enemy within." On Monday, she played a highlight reel to paint him as “increasingly unstable and unhinged.”
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Harris wants voters to pay more attention when Trump talks about "the enemy within." On Monday, she played a highlight reel to paint him as “increasingly unstable and unhinged.”

(Image credit: Dustin Franz)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Giant pandas will arrive at D.C.'s National Zoo this week
item.description: After an 11-month wait, giant pandas will populate the zoo once again. A pair of pandas, which left China on FedEx's "Panda Express" cargo jet, are expected to arrive in the D.C. area on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
After an 11-month wait, giant pandas will populate the zoo once again. A pair of pandas, which left China on FedEx's "Panda Express" cargo jet, are expected to arrive in the D.C. area on Tuesday.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: Willem Marx

item.title: 6 people accuse Sean 'Diddy' Combs of sexual assault in new lawsuits
item.description: The lawsuits filed Monday accuse the hip-hop mogul of raping women, sexually assaulting men and molesting a 16-year-old boy.
item.content:encoded:
The lawsuits filed Monday accuse the hip-hop mogul of raping women, sexually assaulting men and molesting a 16-year-old boy.

(Image credit: Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
